name: Untrustworthiness
text: Forced Interrupt: When a "Boost" or "When Revealed" ability on a [[treachery]] card would be resolved, cancel that ability. Then, deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Laura Green → discard Untrustworthiness.

name: Paibok
text: Toughness. [star] Paibok gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each [[treachery]] card attached to him. Forced Interrupt: When a [[treachery]] card would be discarded, attach it facedown to Paibok instead. (Lyja's nemesis minion.) "Total humilation is truly the best revenge!"

name: Punish the Defector
text: In a battle between the Fantastic Four and her former lover Paibok, Lyja still bore feelings for the Torch and again betrayed Paibok to side with the Fantastic Four. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for a [[treachery]] card and discard it. Shuffle the encounter deck. [hazard]

name: "It's a Stinkin' Skrull!"
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for a [[treachery]] card and discard it. (Shuffle.) If no [[treachery]] card was discarded this way, this card gains surge. "I got real bad news fer ya kid… Yer lovin' wife is a stinkin' Skrull!!" —Thing

name: Truth Revealed
text: When Revealed: Search your deck for all identity-specific cards, shuffle your deck and place those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. "What have you done to my wife?! How long have you been masquerading as her?!" —Human Torch
